Hide.help: Hide makes you almost impossible to detect. When properly 'Hidden", a Stalker can pull off Critical hits with his attacks, and even land a massive 'Assassins Strike' with an Assassins power. When you attack or are damaged while using this power, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see and retain some bonus to Defense. Unlike most stealth powers, Hide can be used at the same time as other Concealment powers, giving you even greater stealth capability. No Endurance cost.

Fast_Healing.help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Reconstruction.help: Through perfect control of your body, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. The effects of Reconstruction also leaves you resistant to Toxic damage for a while. Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} hit points!

Dull_Pain.help: Using ancient techniques, you can make yourself more resilient to pain. Thus, you can take more damage before being defeated. When you activate this power you will increase your maximum Hit Points for a couple of minutes. Recharge: Very Long
Dull_Pain.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Integration.help: You can Integrate your mind and body, making you resistant to Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, and Immobilization effects, as well as increase your regeneration rate, for as long as you can keep this toggle power active. Recharge: Fast
Integration.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize), +Regeneration
Integration.attackerHit: You are now highly resistant to Disorient, Immobilize, Hold, Sleep and Knockback.

Resilience.help: You are more Resilient. This power allows you to build up a resistance to Disorientation effects. You tend not to get Disoriented, and if you do, it wears off quickly. This resistance to Disorientation gets stronger as you go up in level. Resilience also grants some resistance to all types of damage. This power is always on.

Instant_Healing.help: When you activate this power, you can regenerate your health at an astounding rate. This boost to your Regeneration Rate lasts about a minute and takes a long time to recharge once used. Recharge: Very Long
Instant_Healing.attackerHit: You activate {PowerName} and start to Regenerate at an astonishing rate.

Revive.help: Should you fall in battle, you can Revive yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 60 seconds. You will also have 15 seconds of immunity to most damage. Recharge: Very Long
Revive.targetHelp: You have Revived yourself. You are protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds.
Revive.attackerHit: You {PowerName} yourself from the brink of death. You feel weak and cannot do anything for a while.

Moment_of_Glory.help: When you activate this power, you gain Resistance and Defense to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, Knockback, Repel and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Long
Moment_of_Glory.shortHelp: Self +Res(All DMG but Psionics), +DEF(All DMG but Psionics), +Recovery
Moment_of_Glory.attackerHit: You become practically invincible for a very brief time!
